definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Then doubts and fears did assail the very strongest .
sentences.chinese: 疑惑和恐惧的确困扰过意志最坚强的人。

sentences.english: He is a very level-headed guy and very strong.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个非常冷静并且坚强的家伙。

sentences.english: How can you let one individual adamancy rise?
sentences.chinese: 怎么可以让一个人坚强起来？

sentences.english: We are commanded in Scripture to resist him, staying strong in our faith.
sentences.chinese: 我们在圣经中被命令要抵挡他，在信上坚强。

sentences.english: Mr. Andropov is a strong, self-confident leader, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，安德罗波夫先生是一个坚强自信的领导人。

sentences.english: Following a small firm in Shantou said.
The strongest man is the one who stands most alone .
sentences.chinese: 最坚强的人就是最能忍受孤独寂寞的人。

sentences.english: Sally is really hard. She can stand anything.
sentences.chinese: 萨莉真坚强，她能忍受一切。

sentences.english: To be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 要坚强，不让任何事物烦扰内心的平和。

sentences.english: I give to filled with the absolute sincerity you, is willing you to be forever strong, is forever vigorous.
sentences.chinese: 我把满腔赤诚献给你，愿你永远坚强，永远蓬勃。

sentences.english: Paggy hear lesser, also think I should be strong for children.
sentences.chinese: 佩琪听到小雅的话，也觉得本人该为孩子坚强起来。

sentences.english: The fifth time when she forbore for weakness, and attributed her patience to.
sentences.chinese: 第五次是她容忍了软弱，而把她的忍受称为坚强。

sentences.english: Have adamancy, the person that never weeps ?
sentences.chinese: 有坚强，从不落泪的人吗？

sentences.english: With such a view your Awakening practice Will be strong and firm-minded.
sentences.chinese: 生此正见觉醒修持将变得坚强心稳固。

sentences.english: But again how strong, at the loving in front, the flimsiness that person always change.
sentences.chinese: 可是再怎么坚强，在爱的面前，人总是变的脆弱。

sentences.english: “She is soft, ”the Lord agreed, “but I have also made her tough.
sentences.chinese: “她是柔软，”上帝表示同意，“但是我也让她坚强。
